Literature.Title: Synthetic molecular evolution of host cell-compatible, antimicrobial peptides effective against drug-resistant, biofilm-forming bacteria.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2020;117:8437-8448
Literature.Author: Starr CG, Ghimire J, Guha S, Hoffmann JP, Wang Y, Sun L, Landreneau BN, Sammarco MC, Kolansky ZD, Kilanowski-Doroh IM, Morici LA, Wimley WC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1.6µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1.3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=4.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=6.8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=14.8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=9.9µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=7.5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=8.6µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=1.6µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=2.0µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=26.3µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=28.3µM)
